creator: The Galleria Al Maryah Island
descriptionHtml:
Abu Dhabi’s leading lifestyle and shopping destination is just a click away.

With more than 400 international and local shopping, dining and entertainment options, you’ll be spoiled for choice at The Galleria Al Maryah Island. Stay ahead of the news with our mobile app and be the first to know about new store openings, offers and promotions, and exciting events and activities for the entire family.

Plan your visit by browsing through our store locator, or navigate your way to your favourite stores while here using our real-time wayfinding feature.

With first-to-Abu Dhabi brands, award-winning restaurants, world-class entertainment options and all the trends from high street to luxury, The Galleria Al Maryah Island has it all.
descriptionShort: Eat, Play & Shop at Abu Dhabi’s leading lifestyle and shopping destination.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We work hard to constantly improve your experience. In this version, you'll experience bug fixes and improved app performance.
